bibl.title: Graeco-Roman Funerary Stelae from Upper Egypt. (Liverpool Monographs in Archaeology and Oriental Studies.)
bibl.note: 1. Principal Sites [Abydos, Coptos, Dendereh]. - 2. Catalogue of Graeco-Roman Stelae from Upper Egypt. - 3. Iconography. - 4. The Inscriptions. - 5. Workmanship and Dating: Significance. - Lists. Index. Bibliography.
bibl.seg: ABDALLA Aly, Graeco-Roman Funerary Stelae from Upper Egypt. (Liverpool Monographs in Archaeology and Oriental Studies.)
Liverpool, Liverpool University Press, 1992, 4Â°, xviii-153 pp., 3 cartes et 84 pll. ISBN 0-85323-125-7.

1. Principal Sites [Abydos, Coptos, Dendereh]. - 2. Catalogue of Graeco-Roman Stelae from Upper Egypt. - 3. Iconography. - 4. The Inscriptions. - 5. Workmanship and Dating: Significance. - Lists. Index. Bibliography.

C.R. par Jean Bingen, ChrEg 69 (1994) No. 138, pp. 382-383. - Wolfgang Brunsch, Orientalia 62 (1993) pp. 302-306. - Herman De Meulenaere, BibO 51 (1994) coll. 315-318. - Klaus Parlasca, OLZ 88 (1993) coll. 259-262. - Klaus Parlasca, JEA 82 (1996) pp. 239-241.
